ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord, help me because of their calling me a liar!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (The apostle prayed): "O Lord, deliver me, for they accuse me of lies."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The Messenger said: "My Lord! Come to my help at their accusing me of lying."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Messenger prayed, "Lord, help me; they have called me a liar".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “My Lord! Help me as they deny me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "O my Lord! Help me because they deny me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: O my Lord! help me against their calling me a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'O my Lord, help me, for that they cry me lies.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord! Help me because they deny me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The messenger said, "My Lord, help me, for they have rejected me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: my Lord! vindicate for they belie me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! Help me, for they impugn me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (The prophet) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "O my Lord! Help me because they deny me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Help me, Lord, they belie me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord, help me, for they have rejected me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:39] He said, ‘My Lord, help me because they have denied me’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) the Messenger said: (My Lord! Help me) by sending punishment on them (because they deny me) because they disbelieve in my message,
